text: "Wrapped Up in You" is a recorded by American country music artist Garth Brooks. It was released in October 15, 2001 as the first single from his eighth studio album Scarecrow. ==Music video== The music video for "Wrapped Up in You" was directed by Jon Small. It premiered on CMT on November 9, 2001. On January 25, 2002, the music video for "Wrapped Up in You" took the top spot of CMT's Top 20 Countdown, where it remained for two weeks. ==References== Category:2001 songs Category:Garth Brooks songs
title: Wrapped Up in You
